text: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ مَعَهُۥٓ ءَالِهَةٞ كَمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا

translation.en: Say, [O Muhammad], "If there had been with Him [other] gods, as they say, then they [each] would have sought to the Owner of the Throne a way
translation.id: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "jika ada tuhan-tuhan disamping-Nya, sebagaimana yang mereka katakan, niscaya tuhan-tuhan itu mencari jalan kepada Tuhan yang mempunyai Arasy
